VALIDATION.MAX_LENGTH: The {{field}} field must have at most {{max}} characters
VALIDATION.MIN: The {{field}} field must be greater than {{min}}
VALIDATION.MAX: The {{field}} field must be less than {{max}}
VALIDATION.PATTERN: The {{field}} field has an invalid format
VALIDATION.NUMBER: The {{field}} field must be a valid number

VALIDATION.PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH: Password must have at least 6 characters
VALIDATION.PASSWORD_MAX_LENGTH: Password must have at most 50 characters

VALIDATION.PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH_REGISTER: Password must have at least 8 characters

VALIDATION.PASSWORD_NUMBER: Password must contain at least one number
VALIDATION.PASSWORD_SPECIAL_CHAR: Password must contain at least one special character
VALIDATION.NOME_MIN_LENGTH: Name must have at least 2 characters
VALIDATION.NOME_MAX_LENGTH: Name must have at most 100 characters
VALIDATION.CPF_INVALID: CPF must have a valid format
